Aconex (Oracle) | San Francisco, CA USA | Full-time | Senior Software Engineer, Senior UI Engineer | ONSITE Aconex (Oracle) is the industry leading collaboration company with most of the worlds largest construction companies as customers. We are to construction projects what Atlassian is to software projects.

We're looking to grow our team of experienced software developers to help us continue to deliver against our roadmap. Our stack is based on a service oriented architecture, so we have a number of different technologies at play - Java, Go, Ruby, Python etc. To begin with, you'll be working with Java 8 (using Dropwizard), Angular, Typescript as well as many other tools.

Love to chat stack, so if you're interested - reach out!

Technology choice is open for discussion on new services that we start.

More about us: https://www.oracle.com/industries/construction-engineering/p.... If you're interested, email me at matt.wedgwood(at )oracle( dot)com
